English: Strict mode restricts card transformations to only those you have discovered the idea for first.#For example, if Stick does not appear under Resources in the ideas sidebar#your villagers cannot turn a wood card into a stick card.
If enabled, strict mode will be saved with the new save file.#It will ignore the current value set in the Mod's Options screen.
Strict Mode is <color=blue>[enabled]</color>, in the Mod Options screen.
Strict Mode is <color=blue>[enabled]</color>, in this save file.#Ideas known at save start: <color=blue>[count]</color>.#Ideas known currently: <color=blue>[current]</color>.
Clearing the save removes all ideas, quests, etc from the save slot.
Strict Mode was enabled with [ideas] ideas known at start of game.
A notification is displayed when the game starts#to remind the player whether Strict Mode#is enabled and whether that setting came from the#save file or from the mod options screen.
